ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn,id,name,gds,eleqty,elepro,addr from ( select '' flag, id,name,gds,eleqty,elepro,addr from ( select usrid id,usrnam name,sum(nvl(eleqty,0)) eleqty,max(gds) gds,max(elepro) elepro,max(a.addr) addr from tax_eledata a,( select b.ID,b.name,b.flag,c.ammno from tax_company b,tax_cmpammno c where b.id=c.cmid ) b where a.usrid=b.ammno(+) and a.yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and a.yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') and b.ammno = '[%DBNO]' ) t
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'
